title: If Riot were to make a LoL Fighting Game, which would you prefer: 2D, 2.5D, or 3D?
body:
Games like Guilty Gear, Blazblue, and of course Street Fighter have all had success using either 2D, 2.5D, or 3D graphics, but which one would you people prefer?

I'd personally go 2.5D, since you could get cinematic special moves like in Guilty Gear Xrd.
